items.sentence: There\'s not much difference between the two schools.
This is the first time I\'ve ever disagreed with Tom.
Please promise me that you\'ll never lie to me again.
I\'m sure that Tom isn\'t going to help Mary do that.
Tom says he\'ll be sticking around after the meeting.
Tom says he\'s having trouble coping with the stress.
Tom says he\'s spotted something out of the ordinary.
Tom had to stay home from school because he was sick.
Tom spent all day trying to fix the leak in the roof.
Tom started to eat before Mary sat down at the table.
